name: Memory.Blocks();
description:
You have been connected to the system. You have been granted administrator rights there. Make your move. Avoid system's defence. Succeed.

This is a short (like, super short) game I made for the N8Jam. Joined too late so I didn't have enough time to make a lot of levels. Also,  kinda forgot about the "lore" part of the jam since I was in a hurry.  On the other hand, the game supports custom levels made in .txt so you can try making a bunch on your own. 

Hope you'll have at least some fun! Any feedback is appreciated!
